channel.title: CVE Feed for n/a -- Intel(R) i915 Graphics drivers for linux

item.title: CVE-2023-28410|2023-05-10T13:16:37.359Z -- n%2Fa -- intel%28r%29%20i915%20graphics%20drivers%20for%20linux
item.description: Improper restriction of operations within the bounds of a memory buffer in some Intel(R) i915 Graphics drivers for linux before kernel version 6.2.10 may allow an authenticated user to potentially enable escalation of privilege via local access.
